subject: Father's Day
Amateur Athletics
Athletics and Sports
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: As the often-perplexed father of two girls, Ella and Sylvia, I have been smitten with everything they have done on the court, the field, the track and assorted other places.
snippet: As the often-perplexed father of two girls, Ella and Sylvia, I have been smitten with everything they have done on the court, the field, the track and assorted other places.
